Sõngr sẽn yaa zaalem n yit Wikipedia pʋgẽ A Ato Panford yaa Ghana politik soab la Ghana naan-soab a naas-n-soaba naan-soaba siglgã taoor lʋɩtb sull sẽn yaa a Shama wã taoor soaba. A yaa Ghana tẽnga politik soab la a yaa Ghana naan-soaab a naas soabã siglgã taoor soab.[1] Sẽn na n wa n wa n yɩlẽ n yãgs b sẽn na n yãk b rĩungã, b tigma b sẽn na yɩl n yãk b sẽn na yɩ b rĩung ning b sẽn na maan n wilg b rĩung wã. A Ato Panford ra kẽeda, la a sã n wa tõog n zab ne a raabdã, a Samuel Erickson Abakah, n yaool n tõog n zab n na n yɩ taoor soaba.[2][3][4][5]

Sõngr sẽn yaa zaalem n yit Wikipedia pʋgẽ A Dominic Akuritinga Ayine ( roga yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem a 6 yʋʋmf 1966) yaa Ghana politik soab.[1] [2][3]A yaa Ghana goosneer a naas-n-soab sull a yopoe soabã ballsõng ning sẽn be Bolgatanga yaang sullã pʋgẽ. A yaa politik sull ning sẽn t'a "National Democratic Congress" (NDC) wã neda.[1][2][3] A Ayine roga yʋʋmd 1966 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem a 6 Zuarungu, Ghana tẽn-kʋre.[1] A paama sɛba karẽn-doog University of Ghana la Ghana School of Law (GSL) yʋʋmd 1995. A paama a LLM (Tõnd tẽn-tẽng laog laog) Michigan Inivɛrsite laog karengẽ yʋʋmd 1998. Rẽ poore, a kẽnga Stanford inivɛrsite wã, Kaliforni, Etazĩni wã, n paam JSD (Trade and Democracy) yʋʋmd 2006.[1] A Ayine yaa kiris-neda. A kẽe kãadem (a tara kamb a yopoe).[1] Laloa tʋʋmde[1] Karen-saamb, University of Ghana, Legon-Accra,[1] Tõod karengã pʋgẽ Minisr sẽn get bʋ-kaoodbã yell.[1]

Seb-kãng la Biiblã, Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ tõndã. Yaa neb toor-toor la Wẽnd yãk tɩ b gʋls-a. Nin-kãensã ra nonga a Zeova ne b sũy fãa. A kõ-b-la a vʋʋsem sõngã tɩ b gʋlse. 2. B wilgame t’a Zeova naana bũmb fãa, t’a naana dũn’yã ne a pãn-kãsengã. Tɩ sɩngrẽ wã ninsaal ra zemsa zãnga, la kɩɩsa a Wẽnnaam n kong arzãnã. B leb n goma malɛk a ye yelle, sẽn kɩɩs a Zeova naam sẽn ka to wã. Yaa rẽndã n wa ne yel-wẽnã la kũumã. La keta bilfu, t’a Zeova sãam-a. 3. Tõnd tara sũ-noog wakat kãngã menga. Yɛlã wilgdame tɩ ka la bilfu, Wẽnd Rĩungã na n kẽesa a toogo. Luk 21:10, 11; 2 Tɩmote 3:1-5 Biiblã ra pĩnd n togsa yɛl tɩ pidsd rũndã-rũndã. A yeelame tɩ nebã na n yɩɩ ligd-nongdba, ba-rãmb la ma-rãmb kɩɩsdba, pʋto-rãmb la neb sẽn nong dũniyã sũ-noogo. A yeelame me tɩ tẽn-digimdg kãsemse, zaba, kom la bã-longds na n zĩndame. Woto fãa bee rũndã-rũndã. A Zezi yeelame me tɩ b na n moona Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã dũniyã gill zugu.—Matɩe 24:14. Wẽnnaam Rĩungã na n kɩtame tɩ wẽnem buud fãa sa. 2 Pɩɛɛr 3:13 Ka la bilfu, a Zeova na n sãama nin-wẽnsã fãa. B na n sɩbga a Sʋɩtãan ne zĩn-dãmbã. Sã n tõe, karm-y tɩ kɛlgdbã kelge. Y sã n dat n gom bũmb bãngdbã sẽn wilg yelle, bɩ kiba-kɩtbã sẽn togse, wall bũmb a to yelle, y tog n deng n bao n bãnga sã n yaa sɩda. Y sẽn yetã segd n zemsa ne bũmb ning y sẽn tik n gomdã. Y sã n dat n bilg vɛrse võore, bɩ y bao n bãng a Zeova sẽn date. Bakshy (Pars: بخشی, Romanized: baxši) yaa Turkmenid-dãmb sẽn maand yɩɩlã.[1] B sẽn sɩng n yaaẽ wã, b yɩɩla yɩɩnd dãmb la samaan dãmb sẽn da wat n maand sãambã, la b yɩɩnd n maand kibsã, rogemã la yɛl a taab sẽn tar yõod wʋsg vɩɩmã pʋgẽ. B yɩɩla a cappella bɩ b yɩɩl ne bũmb nins b sẽn boond tɩ tãnsã (kãsenga yaa tãnsã sẽn tar pʋga a yiib n boond tɩ dutar). Tʋrkmen bakshy tradisõ wã tara zood sõma ne Turkic Ashik tradisõ sẽn yaa kãseng n yɩɩd. Kopačka (Macedonian; English) yaa Macedonian oro, sẽn yaa reem buud sẽn yit Pijanec, sẽn yaa tãens sẽn be Macedonian rɩtgã. Kopačka wã yaa reem-dãmb sẽn yaa rap n maandẽ. Yaa reem sẽn yaa yãg-yãg ne nao-kasẽnga, sẽn naag ne zũnd-zũndg wʋsgo, n paas n kẽnd n zũndgdẽ. Neb nins sẽn maand we-rũngã zãada b sẽbdgã ne b goabg n gãd rɩtgã, n sɩng we-rũngã n na n yɩ wa sɛk-sɛka. D sã n wa beẽ, d segd n yɩɩndame. NOWE ra tara pag la kom-dibli a tãabo. A kom-dibli wã yʋy yaa a Sɛm, a Kam la a Zafɛt. Bãmb me ra tara pagba. Dẽnd a Nowe zaka rãmb fãa ra yaa neb a nii. Wẽnnaam yeela a Nowe t’a ka koom koglg sẽn yaa bedre. Nebã ra nan zɩ n yã koom koglg ye. Koglgã ra yaa bedr wa batayo, n yaa woko. Wẽnnaam yeela a Nowe t’a ka koglgã ‘tɩ yɩ rot a tãab n dogl taab zutu, la a maan ro-pʋse.’ Ro-pʋsã ra yaa a Nowe ne a zaka rãmb yĩnga, la rũmsã ne rɩɩbã me yĩnga. A Nowe ne a zaka rãmb ra bee koglgã pʋgẽ n gũudẽ masã. Mams-y n ges-y yãmb me sẽn da na n be koglgã pʋgẽ ne a Nowe rãmb n gũudẽ. Wẽnnaam da na n sɩd kɩtame tɩ sa-kãsengã ni bɩ? Sɩngre 6:9-22; 7:1-9. Sõngr sẽn yaa zaalem n yit W ikipedia pʋgẽ A Eric Afful sẽn dog yʋʋmd 1974 [1]sigr kiuug rasem a wã yaa Ghana nin-tũud a ye, la a yaa Ghana Republic a naas soabã Siglgã sull a yopoe soabã ned sẽn yaa Amenfi West sullã taoor lʋɩtb sull sẽn be Western Region sẽn be National Democratic Congress (NDC) wã pʋgẽ.[2] A Afful roga yʋʋmd 1974 sɩpaolg kiuug rasem a-ye daare.[1] A yita Asankragwa, tẽng sẽn be Ghana tẽn-tẽng sẽn be Western Region.[2] A kẽnga Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology wã la a paama Masters degree ne Economics yʋʋmd 2010.[1] A kẽnga University of Cape Coast, Ghana la a paama a Master of Art in Human Resource Development yʋʋmd 2016.[2] A Afful yaa nin-sabls sull ning sẽn boond tɩ National Democratic Congress (NDC). Yʋʋmd 2012 wã pʋgẽ, a saka NDC sull a yoob-n-soab sull sẽn yaa Amenfi West sullã la a tõoge.[2] A Afful yaa kiris-neda(Methodist). A kẽe kãadem (a tara kamb a tãabo).[2]

1Yenɛ, hom de mam Yenɛ, mam suunre eere la hom. Mam eere ho mɛ wo ko'om la. Mam iŋa ki mɛ wo pɔgɔtia poan te ko'om ka bɔna la ɛɛra hɔ. 2Mam nyɛ ho paŋa, la ho soŋa n ane se'em ho Yire la poan. 3Ho zo'ohogɔ la n gane vom la zuo, mam nɔɔrɛ wa wan pɛngɛ la hom. 4Mam pɛngere hɔ n vom wa woo poan. Mam wan ŋmɛ nu'po'ɔ yi' la hom yu'urɛ. 5Mam suunre tegɛ mɛ wo kaam nɛnɔ n ne obe tegɛ se'em la, te mam nɔɔrɛ yoona nyeema yooma pɛngera hɔ. 6Mam han gan'an n soŋɔ zuo, mam tɛn'ɛhere la ho yele, ge ihegera yu'uŋɔ tɛn'ɛhera ho yɛla la. 7Se'ere n sɔe la, hom de mam soŋorɛ. Mam wan sogɛ la hom poan, ge yoona la popeelom. 8Mam sea lo mɛ la hom. Ho zuɔ nu'o n gorɛ mam tara. 9Ge sɛba n eere ba ko mam la wan sige teŋa teŋa. 10Ba wan ki zaberɛ poan. Sanhe wan aanhom ba. 11Ge naba la wan bɔna Yenɛ poan nyeena. Sɛba woo n tare Yenɛ yu'urɛ wa te de dɛna ba pɔtɛ la wan pɛngera en, ge ponpɔrɔŋdoma nɔya wa le'.
